name: Mudaliyar Matrimony - Free Matrimony, Marriage App
description: MudaliyarMatrimony App, part of CommunityMatrimony, is the most trusted matrimony service for Mudaliars across the world. You can choose Mudaliar bride and groom profiles from major cities across Tamil Nadu, India and NRIs from abroad. Thousands of Mudaliyars have successfully found their life partner here. You too can find a Perfect Match. 100% Safe and Secure app. Register FREE.  Top MudaliyarMatrimony App Features:  - Free Registration - User friendly interface and easy partner search options  - Get daily matches on mobile and email - Express your interest to shortlisted matches - Get instant alerts when there is a communication  - Shortlist and save potential matches - Interact with other members using the chat feature  Lakhs of registered members are from all major Mudaliar community sub-castes such as Agamudayar, Arcot, Thuluva, Vellala, Sengunthar, Kaikolar, Kerala Mudali, Isai Vellalar, Kongu Vellala, Saiva Pillai Tirunelveli, Shoziya Vellalar, Veerakodi Vellala and Thondai Mandala Vellala.  We have members from major cities in Tamil Nadu like Chennai, Vellore, Bangalore, Coimbatore, Salem, Cuddalore, Erode, Kanchipuram and Tiruvannamalai, other Indian cities like Mumbai, Delhi, Bengaluru, Hyderabad etc., besides Mudaliar NRIs from USA, UAE, Singapore, Kuwait, Oman, UK, Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Malaysia and Canada.  You can find brides and grooms from different Professions, Educational Backgrounds, Regions & Sub Castes, Our databases of Tamil Mudaliyars aims to provide you with the best possible match to find the love of your life. Download app today and find your life partner!  Get the Premium Advantage  A Premium Membership means: - You can talk directly to the opposite match - You can get contact details including phone number, mail id and address.  - You can also chat live with members you like - You can send personalised messages to people you like  Mudaliyar Matrimony App is part of Community Matrimony from Matrimony.com, which also offers language based matrimonial service like Tamil Matrimony. The app is designed keeping in mind various partner preferences that a bride or groom might have while choosing their life partner. The Mudaliyar Matrimony app is intelligently developed to give you the best results while matching you with your life partner.  You can also find your partner from other Regional Apps of Bharat Matrimony including Tamil Matrimony.  Thousands of Mudaliars from across Tamil Nadu, India and the world have found their perfect life partner here.  The MudaliyarMatrimony App is light and easy to use and it occupies very little phone space.  So, what are you waiting for? Download the MudaliyarMatrimony App Now and find your perfect life partner! Register FREE.
